creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: mountain scene: rocky, snowy mountains rendered in grey, blue, purple, white, blue, and pink
inscription: left, red cursive jizuri: 自摺　ユングフラウ山 {Jizuri, Yungufurau-yama} | bottom, in pencil: The Jungfrau, #14, 1925
markings: LLC, red artist\'s seal G: (Edelweiss floral pattern)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Jungfrau
